price: “Ani Gooftaa kiyyaafi Gooftaa keessanittin maganfadhe akka (dhagaan tumtanii nan) ajjeefne
arabic: وَإِنِّي عُذۡتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمۡ أَن تَرۡجُمُونِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-innī ʿudh'tu birabbī warabbikum an tarjumūni
